content.detailedDescription: We went to mercer county park at about 11:50 for a memorial weekend retreat. i first noticed object in the sky after i watched some balloons fly off into the distance and saw a very peculiar one that seemed not to be moving at all. i started watching it for a while seeing if it was going to move or not, and after a couple minutes just thought to myself it was probably just really high up so i'm not noticing the movements down here. after about 10 minutes i decided to look up and see if it was still there, and surprisingly it still was; this is when i called some of the other family members to come look at it to have them voice their opinions on what it could be and after a brief look at it everyone agreed it was a kite that someone just decided to fly really high up (this is when i took a picture to see what it could be). since that moment about 20-30 minutes went by and looking back i noticed the object still hadn't moved, this is when i noticed a large passenger plane fly by it, showing whatever it was, was a large object. this is when the object then first moved, it appeared slow but compared to the jet's speed it was extremely fast. roughly 5 minutes afterwards it made an extremely fast jolt towards the right before it rocketed up into the sky until it faded out of view upwards. this is what then made me think it was truly some type of ufo craft.
content.summary: An unknown object was seen by me and some family members in mercer county park,

content.detailedDescription: i do not have all the dates but over a 5 year period i was abducted probably 10 times.  i would be sound asleep and all of a sudden would hear whispering then could not move my body.  then about 2 hours later i would wake up and would feel like a truck had run over me.  most of the times there were puncture marks on me and lot of time they were centered around my navel for some reason.  for days i would feel like all my energy had been drained from me and of course i could not sleep because i was scared to death.  one really scary time i heard the whispering and managed to turn over in my bed before i was paralyzed.  there were approximately 5-6 alien creatures looking at me.  they were talking to each other but their mouths were not moving but i could understand what they were saying.  they were upset that i had seen them.  they were very small-about the size of a 9-10 year old child.  i said to them "please not again" and then i was out for 2 hours.  once i was about 52 years old the abductions stopped and have not happened again but i am still scared.  i have never told anyone this story for fear they would put me in the funny farm but i know this happened to me.
content.summary: On several occasions i was abducted by aliens.

content.detailedDescription: We own a truck company and we were deleting to dugway military base first we had to get clearance than we wait about an hour for a military escort once through the check points we started through the base into the desert first all the buildings were empty as were all further checkpoints than as we approach the desert a military drone followed us as we went deeper into the desert there were roads that ended into mountain side and a giant cement staircase in the middle of the desert with no cement or asphalt around like a landing pad after driving for about 45 mins or so were are instructed to unload the container we were carrying in the middle of the desert and we were escorted back to the entrance a few days later i was rushed to the hospital in texas where i was treated for kidney failure about a week or so later they had no reason why i had the failure except maybe i was born with it although for 30+ years i've had no problems until  now
content.summary: Delivering to military base

content.detailedDescription: i was living in dumas, texas and working the evening shift in amarillo at one of the hospitals.  dumas is approximately 48 miles north of amarillo.  it was about 11:30pm, i was driving home from work, and all of a sudden i heard this loud humming sound.  when i looked up almost right above me about the length of a football field there was this very large green glowing cigar shaped object.  it had what looked like windows in it but i could not see inside the object.  it hovered there for approximately 10 minutes then all of a sudden took off like a rocket and was gone from sight.  this was just the beginning of my ordeal with ufo's.  i have never told anyone about any of my encounters because i figured they would think i was crazy so was excited when i learned about your organization on the history channel.  i am sending another report.
content.summary: Heard a loud humming noise and looked up and saw a large green cigar shaped object in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
i was going home may 23 2015 from a campground at approx. 12:30 am (now the 24th) where my rock band had just performed. app. 2 miles ahead i saw two very bright lights approaching. they randomly went out and one light (also bright) would appear and go out then the two lights would appear again. this happened about three times. then, they went by me and out of sight.
 when i first saw them, a red flag went up in my head. i  thought this could be something not normal. i did not hear a sound from them. the lights passed by within 200 ft.
  my base player was in his car in front of me. he saw the whole thing.
content.summary: Lights came from app. 2 miles frm sw  lights came twards me left side of road and went by me at a steady rate of speed into the distance.

content.detailedDescription: Having a bbq outside and was identifying planets and stars with my friend as our girlfriends were in conversation. noticed a bright light that was travalinging south and then stopped suddenly. it then made a right angle turn to the west and went a short distance and stopped. then proceeded south for a bit then back east all making sudden stops with right angle manuvuers.The object stopped and then what appeared to leave at an accellerated rate straight away from us until it disappeared.
content.summary: Object doing strange manuvuers in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I and a friend who is also a neighbor of mine was sitting outside talking and we saw in the sky a slow moving object which my friend said it looks like a ufo.So i got my video camera on my phone out and started taking videos.It stopped a couple of times over rt 50w in athens ohio.It was heading in the direction of athens ohio.There is a lake out near where we live called beachwood lake on beachwood estates drive.It was in that direction and near stagecoach road.It also hovered and descended.Me and my friend went to the highway where i took six minutes of video of the object which was stationary the object was seen for 2 hours and i have 6 minutes of video of the said object.It occurred from 930pm-11;45-51pm.It stood stationary hovered and descended and ascended a couple times its descentents took it to under treetop level.Also my friend heard rustling in the woods after the ufo was first seen by us.It was flying towards athens ohio.There is the ridges a nursing home a cellphone tower in the area but the light was nowhere near the cellphone tower and was not eminating from the cellphone tower.There was a drone in the area but no planes or other crafts just the ufo and the drone.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo seen by two people in athens ohio on memorial day monday

content.detailedDescription:
I was with a friend walking from the car to a restaurant when i looked up at a southwest jetliner flying overhead. directly in front of it (between the jet and myself) was a solid white object, hovering stationary in the east, which appeared to be changing shape slightly. it looked like it was maybe rectangular or angular and then spherical or egg shaped. initially, i thought it was a huge cluster of all-white balloons. i scanned the sky to see if perhaps there were any other stray balloons. i then saw 2 more objects of identical size and shape to the north east (left) at nearly the same altitude, perhaps about 300 - 400 feet apart from each other but about 1200-1500 feet from the first object, also hovering but moving around laterally and close together. my friend and i were fixated on them asking each other what we thought they were. after about 15 minutes of watching them, based on their coordinated movements and lack of gaining altitude, we concluded they were not balloons and clearly not helicopters, planes or drones as they produced no sound and did not exhibit the typical movements associated with those craft. the pair to the north east (left) began a synchronized, straight path movement toward the first object in the east (on right), joined the 1st object in relative distance to each other and ascended in formation together at a moderate speed.

i was able to snap a few photos with my iphone 5s but the objects are very small in the frame. it was much clearer to the eye to see their shape and gauge their size. video was useless as the phone couldn't focus on them. i'd estimate the size of each of the 3 objects to be 15 - 30 feet. all were of identical size and shape, color, manner and movement. there were no appendages such as tail, wings, rotors, etc.
content.summary: White object, hovering. initially thought it was a group of ballons until 2 more joined the 1st in formation and departed together..

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: While l was moving stuff from my house to my friends l noticed these strange lights in the sky,l decided to take a few snap shots and then the video, it was hovering flickering changed colours and then shape l hope this helps.V
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I was moving my friends stuff l was storing for him and it caught my attention please let me know what you think, l appologise for the end part l dropped my ciggie. v

content.detailedDescription: I was having flashes of memories (my first and only memory as a baby) of an amber room with an orange light that blinded me while i was immobilized on a table and there were 3 to 5 huge, bulbous heads looking over and down on me.  i tried to cry and scream but could not.  i was adopted and nothing was known about anything like this, but they were surfacing like crazy.  i had gone to nyack to visit a friend who is heavy into spiritualism and energy and healing.  i was staying in the guest house by the pool, and at 3 am my french bulldog began acting funny, nervous, scratching at the door, so, assuming she needed to go outside i took her for a short walk. i remember thinking how nervous and hyper she was acting, and then i remember looking up at the sky and thinking i had never seen a sky look so black, almost ink like, and seen so many stars.  the air was full of some sort of electricity because my hair stood up on arms and on my neck and head.  my frenchie also had a trail of hair that stood up all down along her spine, like a scared cat would look.  i suddenly was drawn to the sky again and in the far off i saw what looked at first to be a jet plain with three lights on it, except there was no blinking of the lights.  as it approached, i saw the stars going through where the wings should have been and immediately realized i was looking at three separate objects.  they almost knew i had seen them is how i felt, like i was being watched.  i saw them turn, in unison, and veer directly for me where i stood.  at this point my frenchie began screaming and trying to crawl up my leg.  as they began to near me, i was frozen and could not stop staring.  i remember thinking "pinch your arm!  make sure you are really seeing this!"  as they approached the two in the rear began to fire what looked like a blue beam of electricity back and forth (communication, maybe?) as they got in line with the street i was on i began to smell sulphur, like i was in a field where a lot of fireworks had just been set off.  they seemed to be zooming straight toward us.  as they came up the hill over the street, i picked up my frenchie and began to run in total fear back to the house, trying to reach the gate to the back area where the pool was.  the street lights began going out as they passed over them, i do remember that.  the electricity in the air was so strong, the air was dry and could choke you.  my frenchie at this point was hysterical, but we made it to the gate and the lights seemed to veer up and go over us straight up and i ran into the guest house, immediately closing and locking the doors and actually sitting against the door.  for a few seconds, there was no noise of any bugs, crickets, animals, nothing.  sulphur could be smelled, lights very faintly appeared through the blinds then everything was immediately back to normal.  my frenchie also seemed to go right back to normal behavior as well, which was odd.  i had to lay down, feeling weak and exhausted.  the next day when i awoke, a panic attack gripped me.  i am not sure what they were, or what they wanted, but it was a very negative encounter.  if there is such a thing as evil, this is exactly what was coming towards me.  there was nothing good about the entire thing.  every internal alarm i had in me went off with ferocity.  my "fight or flight" instinct was beyond my control.  to this day, it haunts me.  i did also hear of a few other people in the area who had seen these amber orbs.
content.summary: 3 spheres of glowing, changing lights i remember amber was very obvious

content.detailedDescription: As i was riding home from school, i was at a red light. i looked at the target and saw this grey cloud colored thing with no noticeable detail, flying in a direction. when i first saw it, i thought it was a plane at a position where i couldn't see the wings. after i spotted it, the thing increased and decreased elevation while going forward without changing angle. i had a wft moment. then it went behind a cloud and it was gone. this all happened within a minute.
content.summary: Increased and decreased elevation while going forward without changing angle

content.detailedDescription: I was on my back patio having coffee and i noticed this white oval object of the corner of my eye.I watched it slowly but go across in a straight line not making a sound.There was a helicopter before i saw this in the area but that was all i saw before the object.But i did notice it took it's time coming out of the cloud cover.I want to know if anyone has seen this object.Because i have seen it four times already in two months.The object did disappear.
content.summary: The object is white but transparent and moves slowly in a straight line.No sound  ,

content.detailedDescription:
I something odd in the skies over west view on saturday may 23, 2015. it was around 1 pm. i was walking back from bellevue, on the bridge headed back to west view, the one that passes over route 279. i looked up and to my right, maybe 15-20° or so, i saw something very strange: a square object off to the right in the general direction of the west view park shopping center and as much as several hundred feet off the ground.  it looked like it – guessing here – maybe a mile away. it was about as big as a postage stamp at arm’s length. 
here is the obligatory crackpot disclaimer: i’m not one. this is my first such report and my first such experience. 
just so it is clear, i saw this object, whatever “it” was, saw it as plainly as i have ever seen anything in my life. my problem is that i don’t know what i unmistakably saw. this isn’t a case where something flashed by – maybe - and i wondered not only what i had seen but whether i had seen anything at all. i saw this; i saw it distinctly; i watched it for a good five minutes. it was outlined completely against the sky so it was unmistakably in the air. it was a dark green though i couldn’t make out any further detail. 
it wasn’t shaped like any aircraft i have ever seen (nor did it resemble any flying saucer i have ever seen in books). there were no wings or rotors or propellers or fins. it made no noise, at least that i could hear. it was a square. a big dark green square up in the air. i couldn’t even tell if it was a cube. it was like it was facing me. 
i thought at first that it might be some kind of promotional float at the wvpsc especially with it being a holiday weekend but it was moving and it had no writing on it (at least that i could see). (west view had its memorial day parade on monday, two days after my sighting.) it ended up drifting off directly away from me, in an easterly direction until it disappeared over the tree-line. 
it wasn’t a balloon. it wasn’t tear-drop shaped; there was no basket underneath it with people in it. it was much too big to be a kite. it wasn’t shaped like a blimp or anything that flies around. other people had to see it. it was just off a major thoroughfare, route 279 in the middle of a sunny weekend day.
if you’re wondering, i don’t have a camera phone so i don’t have a picture of it. my hope is that someone else has already contacted you about what i saw and so you already know what it is i saw. 
while i have numerous books about ufo, i remain unconvinced of any particular viewpoint. the only thing i am certain of is that the official explanations in all the best cases are unconvincing. 

[witness name removed/dr/cms]
west view pa
content.summary: Dark green square object observed near route 279

content.detailedDescription:
In back yard doing chors. at first looked like buzzards at a distance but when came closer  3 was disc shaped 3 was delta shaped. can give detailed info if some is willing to contact me. have had 4 encounters all together with that said here is some highlights .The objects was flying in formation with one delta and one disc swapping out in the formation.Flying slowly north sometimes riseing and lowering in altitude.Seemed to be almost playfull.When i first saw them they were farther away maybe a couple miles away then the drifted closer and closer yet higher and higher.One of the disc broke formation a did circles around the formation then went back in formation. at least 2 others did somewhat the same . after that i saw something aproching from the north headed to them. they were shiney that's how i spoted them the glint of the sun reflected off them as they got closer i saw it was 3 jets . they did not seem to be in  much of a hurry tho. they came from the direction of chattanooga tn. this was about 20 to 30 miles from there.I watched this for a time took a while for them to get where the ufo's were. about that time i saw 3 delta wing fighter with after burnners on coming from the direction of atlanta ga southeast of where i was.Hight altitude  but could make them out well. day was clear.When they got a few miles away  one of the other jets from the north broke formation headed  for the ufo one disc broke formation headed to that jet they passed eachother almost crashing then it veered up and followed that jet when that jet got to the other ufo's it veered off.Went up at that time 3 delta ufo seperaited from the group.And all planes and ufo broke formation and planes whent after all ufo's. the ufo's where much faster than the jets and  sometimes would chase the jets others would circle the jets. at this time the jets tried to fire on the ufo's but could not hit them.First fireing guns then firing missiles at them.Still they couldnot hit them.  then  they all when separate  directions  chaseing the ufo's getting lower and lower headed toward me and my father. they got so low that the ufos would almost touch the ground in the open ares. but jets couldnot get any lower than the trees .Lost track of most of them but two of the  disc seemed to slow down to let the jets delta wing jets get close then veering off suddenly. near the end one delta fighter fired a rocket hitting the disc in the rear causeing a peace of the disc to fall off in the hallow closest to us but was on someone else property could not go there.After that they all flew off  to the west jets still chaseing them and went out of site. this all took less than 30 min. what is interesting is that night there appeard an sphere about the size of a small car came from the west stoped directly over the site where the piece of the disc had fell.It glowed yellow orange. hovered for about 3 min  went down to the ground not touching the ground then shined a beam looked somewhat like a split lazor beam like it was scanning for the piece of the disc stayed there for a few min rose up and shot off west from where it came.It came back 2 more times each nite same time at night.Finely did not return agean.The second day after if first came  about 4 in the afternoon.Got a call from my grandmother witch lived on the same property about an 8th of a mile closer to the highway than us.And said there was some military vehickels coming up the hill wanted to talk to the owner of our property.First a jeep with a commander and a officer and 2 mp's got to us first followed by a large truck with covered bed next came a duce and a half with a officer and soldger in the cab and several soldgers in the back followed by another jeep with mp's in it. note they all had guns and rifles .The commander got out of the jeep and talked to us.He said that the where having manuvers in the area and one of the planes  lost a piece off of it and wanted to go get it said we should show him where is was and they would go get it. and orderd us to not ever say anything to anyone about what happened and even that they were there at all or quote. there have been people lost in the desert and never found".They whent there got an object and came back  as they passed us i saw an object coverd in the truck looked like a part circle sticking up about 6 feet by 10 feet . they left and never heard from them agean. for all the details you may contact me.Can draw the ufo if needed.I fear the military no more and must tell this to some one that counts. because i have not heard of anything close to this . i have been resurching ufo's ever sence.Allso note this was in the 60's and  i have had 4 encounters thru my lifetime.


+
content.summary: 6 ufo's engaged with 6 fighters

content.detailedDescription:
I saw the entity first in native language news channel 
witness is  at the home, neighbours called me and wanted me see the creatures above flying.
first he saw one creature landing on window type air conditioner and that time another creature came and took that creature and flyed away into sky 
after two days first he saw four creatures going one direction and after some time he saw 7 creatures coming from another direction one of tmen in 7 creatures took the hands of one of them in 4 and spined up in the sky 
 playing in pairs(couples) some are emitting light and some are disappeared. another incident appear in the town(nellore) in andhra pradesh state one small type of alien created died on the road with blood on the body.
content.summary: Entities playing, two couples spinning and going to sky.

content.detailedDescription:
We observed this ufo while parked on sierra ave in lytle   creek. i first noticed a plane with a trail flowing behind it, as it passed i saw what i thought was a star over the mountain range. when i first noticed it it was stationery but as i stared at it i noticed it was hovering over the mtn range to the right and then back to the left, then up and back down and to the right as though it were searching for "something". my boyfriend says that he could see what looked like a triangular shaped beam of light coming from the underside of it.  we lost sight of it as it was getting pretty foggy. this light
  we observed n.W. toward cucamonga peak and just above the mountain range.  about  6 months before this i had a similar sighting above etiwanda falls in rancho cucamonga during the day. for a few minutes after this most recent incident i was trembling  with excitement at what i had seen and because i was not alone in witnessing it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Appeared to be a star then began to move erratically and cast  a triangular light below it as though it were searching for something then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving my front door for a walk and looked up at the sky (as i often do) to check out the stars and planets. i saw what i thought was a planet, perhaps venus because it was so bright. but i only saw it for about a second when as i was looking at it, it dimmed quickly and vanished. it reminded me of the international space station or some such satellite moving into earth's shadow.  but i had only seen it for a very brief moment before it disappeared and so i was not able to detect much motion. it seemed like it was moving eastward. but it is hard to tell with such a brief observation. i do not believe there was a cloud obscuring the light. it could have been a meteor or a satellite, but i checked the position of the international space station and it was listed as being many hundreds of miles away, over the atlantic ocean between the us and europe or africa. far away, anyway, and i don't think the likely culprit. also, i get notifications from spot the station and i hadn't received notice that it was going to be passing overhead tonight. i also checked a satellite tracking site and it showed nothing overhead at the time. so, i suppose a meteor is the most likely candidate, but i wondered if anyone else saw a vanishing bright whitish point of light in the sky in the south florida area. i know it wasn't venus or jupiter as i verified their positions once i got my bearings outside. venus was well in the western sky and jupiter closer to zenith at the time.

anyone else see something like this?
content.summary: A bright object, brighter than venus dimmed and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
A major desert thunderstorm followed a large wind/dust storm.  both lasted about an hour.  as the storm was moving out, my friend and i grabbed our cameras to take pictures.  basically, we were taking storm pics, clouds, lightening, etc...As the storm was rolling in.  we were forced inside for a while.  after the storm, we resumed photographing the sierra nevada mountain range and surrounding hillsides as the sun was starting to set.

i didn't notice for a couple of weeks.  i was going back through pictures of my trip and thought the black spot was something on my computer screen.  it was in the picture.

my first thought was that it was smoke from a lightning strike.  i emailed it to my friend and we determined that it was not smoke.  it is too defined.

we believe, taking into consideration that we were not 50 miles from the nevada test site that it could very well be a craft.

also, if you look very closely just below and left of the center of the photo, there is a small diamond shape blip with what looks like a trail as if it was traveling from right to left.  it almost looks like it could be in line with the larger, darker shape

file 1 photo is my picture taken with my nikon (black bell shaped object in the upper right corner.

file 2 photo was taken by my friend 2-5 minutes later with his sony.  he hadn't noticed his until i told him about my pic.  he went back and found this one.
content.summary: Just after a major desert thuderstorm was clearing out.

content.detailedDescription: Mid april of 2014 i had taken my mother to the hospital in petersburg ,va dealing with her cancer well the first night i didn't get out of the hospital til about 2:49am. i get on i-295 north heading back to hopewell and there is no one else in sight going either way, i look up in my rear view mirror and see this light off in the distance not thinking anything of it because i thought it was just another car. i had only looked away for a few seconds but when my eyes met my rear view mirror again the light had gotten so much closer that there was no way possible it could have been a vehicle at that speed. i keep looking at it noticing that it's getting closer and the closer it got to my car the more i was seeing this bright pulsating light(a round pulsating light) . i was starting to get quite nervous ... i start to speed up but the faster i got the closer it got by this time i'm really starting to be scared thinking that my life can't end this way and then i see another vehicle traveling south bound.  i feel like i'm trying to out run this light now as it keeps getting closer until the time that the other vehicle becomes parallel with me , i quickly look in my mirror as the other vehicle passes i see the bright light make a sudden sharp turn towards the vehicle and then all of it disappeared , no where to be see now when i say no where to be seen i mean i couldn't see any light any other vehicles nothing but the road and trees. i feel as if i'm relieved it wasnt me that object had gotten to first.  i finally make it home confused and shocked i couldn't sleep. later that morning i was driving my dad and step mother up to the hospital to see my mom and while on i-295 south we we approaching cop cars ambulances and fire trucks ... we all 3 get to see this van that is up side down hanging in a tree with a big hole in the side that looks as if it was burned into the van . when we left the hospital everything was gone from the spot. i searched for weeks on any info regarding an accident at that location and date but i couldn't find the slightest clue anywhere . i've only told a select few in my family and another site, because of the fact people change their views about you if you say stuff like this. then i started watching the show on tv and seen similar stories .
content.summary: Followed by big pulsating sphere while driving around 3am

content.detailedDescription: 1. standing on back porch and siblings (brother and sister) noticed thecraft. i lookedupand saw the craft andall three of us watched thecraft fly in a straight line for about 2 minutes. no cloud coverage.
content.summary: Silver cigar shaped craft

content.detailedDescription:
My family ( wife and 3 year old daughter) decided to join our friends (2 couples and 2 little girls) for a trip to the poconos this memorial day weekend. we found a lake house at pocono pines where we booked the entire cottage. the back of the cottage has a private beach with breathtaking views of the sunset. at 5pm, the sun was quite bright when i decided to take a picturre in prep of taking shots of the sunset. while taking this picture, i had to almost close my eyes since the sun was so bright. immediately after taking the picture, i didn't realize i had captured something weird but later that night while flipping through pictures with my friends, i noticed this object and was shocked to see what i saw.
i really don't have any explanation whether this could be a satellite/ ufo /saturn or any other star/planet but  curious to know what it is. i would appreciate if the experts could throw some light on this mysterious object. i am willing to answer any questions you might have.
thank you 

i took this picture with my iphone 6plus with no zoom.
content.summary: Captured this picture while taking random shots of the the sun

content.detailedDescription: The occurrence happened when i open my window and happened to look out into the horizon it was fairly dark out. i saw this object coming towards me and it appeared to be fairly bright so i looked closer. then i jumped up out of my bed grab my phone and my mother is well we went outside toobserve the object a little better. we observed it with no sound so i turn my camera on and started filming it. if i can upload my video you can hear my mother saying it looks like a fireball. it moved in a south from move from southwest to northeast motion and then disappeared into the night i got a video because this is the second time i've seen something like this. you can hear my mom in the video saying am i awake. because the previous night she had a dream about a ufo invasion. my heart was racing and it seemed like i was having a anxiety attack my heart was fluttering so bad.A friend of mine captured pictures of it last night. with a different trajectory
content.summary: Glowing cigar shaped type of flying object my mother appeared to feel like she was dreaming and said that it look like a fireball however it had no noise you can see me in the video running to go catch it on the other side of the big tree.

content.detailedDescription:
After finishing a late night card game with my brother and friends, we stepped outside the game room and saw everyone off and as i was walking my brother to his vacation motorhome we stopped to urinate outside in the dark because it is convenient for men to do so. as we were urinating i looked up at the starry sky and commented on the clarity of the atmosphere because humidity was low. at that moment, a large slow moving craft entered our line of sight from behind my party room/man cave which had us looking east as the craft cruised ever so slowly toward the north until it left our field of vision. the craft appeared to be very large, triangular in basic shape but rounded corners and slightly elliptical (or bent) long lines, even in the stern. it emitted no light or sound and the only reason we spotted it was by starlight on the exterior surface and the silhouette that blocked out the stars behind it. as it tracked north, it slowly disappeared from our sight and as i shivered (from what? the cold night, loss of urine, that huge dark silent craft floating along?)and asked my brother what it was that we just observed. he said he didn't see a thing and to never tell anyone of our sighting because of public ridicule and loss of credibility. i was our town's fire chief at that time and my credibility was everything to me so that is why i am this long in reporting this to you. there is nothing here for you to investigate so i don't expect any response. in closing, i'd like to add that i've experienced two other sightings, one at night and the other in the clear of day. i don't know what i saw but that i shouldn't have. thank you for being there when we need you.
p.S. after reading down, i am an artist and could provide you with a sketch of the craft (crafts).
content.summary: Low flying very large rounded triangular with dull dark exterior cruising slowly from east to north east emitting no sound or light.

content.detailedDescription: Was sleeping around 2:00am when suddenly i was awoken to the most terrifying sound coming from right outside my window.  the strange noise was incredibly loud and was absolutely frightening in the worst way.  the whole house shook like it was in an earthquake while the object sounded maybe electrical and mechanical?  i don't know, it was such a strange sound.  like nothing i've ever heard before in my life.  it made maybe a loud "wommmm wommmm wommmm" sound, kind of like a horn, but more of a buzz?  i'm sorry, it was so strange and difficult to describe.  but it continued for a minute or so, after the "wommm wommm" sound, and sounded more like a freight train.  then all of a sudden, the sound disappeared completely.  i'm still terrified sitting here thinking about it.  my wife and kids all slept through it, but i was so scared i couldn't close my eyes...
content.summary: Woke up to terribly frightening sound outside my window

content.detailedDescription: I was heading back to the dorm after dinner. i don't know why it caught everyone's attention, but we all (about a dozen of us) seemed to look up in stunned silence watching this dot of green light bounce around the sky. it seemed like someone had an advanced laser pointer, but there was no trail around it. it moved way too fast to be a human aircraft, but with fort riley nearby, that was my second thought. it was also green on st. patrick's day (we were all completely sober), so it seemed like it might be some kind of joke. after about 30 seconds of sporadic movement and sudden completely motionless stops, it seemed to speed away from the planet in an instant. after it disappeared, we heard people yelling about it blocks away and there was a comment in the school newspaper forum about it from someone who was in the bar district at the time (about four or five blocks away). the guy who was next to me looked at me stunned and asked if we really just saw what he thought we saw and i could only muster a "yep." it was an adrenaline rush and shocking. i couldn't wait to tell everyone about it. disbelief and condemning reactions led me and i'm assuming others to stop bringing it up.
content.summary: A green light jumped around the sky pausing at random locations

content.detailedDescription:
Just a couple years ago, this hunter from this community took me out hunting, it was winter and dark, on our way back to resolute bay, we neared cape marter when we noticed this single bright red light from afar, but that has been approaching slowly, at first we thought it was just a plane approaching, when we realized it was coming too slowly, and it seemed that it would stay in one spot for about 5 seconds before we would notice the red night make a little movement again forward, when we reached around the spot where it would soon come, we stopped our ski-doo's and just waited for it, about 10 minutes later, it started to appear clearer, at about a 150 to 200 feet away from us, approximately 50 feet from the ground...It was so clear, a disk like flying machine or object with red white and blue light's all around the sides, flashing rapidly in perfect circular movement around the ship, about the size of a small plane, a red beam at the front and a huge flash light at the front bottom and was kind of like rotating in circles and back and forth to side to side, it was searching for something, it would stop in mid air while searching with its lights, then moved another 10 feet or so stopped again to search again, it reached about 100 feet away from us and about 50 feet above the ice, i was in complete awe, and amazed to see one that close, when i said...Is that a spaceship ?, the hunter was just standing there in shock and said i don't know, and i new the hunter had an i-pod in his pocket because he took pictures earlier of my catch, so i said take a picture, because mine was very packed up in my pack sack in the back of his sleds, when he did, the bright light from the flash of the camera caught the ships attention or what ever was operating it, and it now turned its attention towards us and was now coming, we both were standing right next to our ski-doo's, by then the ship was about 50 feet away from us, when panic started to attack me, i freaked out, got extremely scared and ran behind the hunters box sleds, but he could not move, although i kept calling his name saying their coming, run, we have to hide, but just before the big lights hit our ski-doo ski's, it rotated back to the direction that it was first going still slanted a little, and it just kept on searching till it disappeared over the hill that we were going to drive passed in order to get home.
and this is nothing, i have many more encounters to tell, and please forgive me for i am not a hundred % on the time's because i had no watch, but from what i asked earlier the hunter, the time it was about 8:30ish about an hour earlier (approx.)
content.summary: Disk like with red white & blue lights all around the edge big searching light at the front, about the size of a small plane, slanted and stops at mid air while searching with big bright lights, dark grey in color

content.detailedDescription:
Friend (sf) & i were leaving goodwill in charlotte - i looked up at sky and mentioned how beautiful the clouds and sky looked. i saw what at first looked like a black bird flying just below the clouds, but at what i estimated to be at least 2 miles high. 

as i watched a few seconds, i called my friend's name to see what i was seeing. i said "that's not a bird."  my friend said "it's not flapping its wings." we watched as it swirled around, doing a loop and flying like a bird would, but never changing its triangle shape. it reversed course to the east, changed to a circle, flew around about a short while, then took off to the north at a fast clip... way too fast for a bird. 

friend thought it might be a drone. i said drones don't change shape or do loops... they fly a straight path. he admitted that it was odd.

this is my third ufo sighting. first time - smoking in parking lot at work, and saw a white tic-tac shaped object fly a straight path into the only cloud in the sky and never come out the other side. 

second time - driving on tryon st. near 485, pulled over to read written directions. looked at row of houses about 200 yds. away to see what looked like a thick, black, domino-shaped object very slowly drifting over the houses. saw longest side of object from my perspective. it was wider than the house it was floating over. behind it, i saw a plane taking off from charlotte-douglas airport. once i arrived at party, told people there, who laughed and said i must've just seen a plane. no one wants to believe, i guess, that such things exist. 

thanks for this site, and the opportunity to share. 
dj
content.summary: Saw black triangle change to an orb

content.detailedDescription:
Object was seen above i-75 at the intersection i have given. observed object for just over 1 minute before it escaped view under tree cover of the neighborhood. during that 1 min time it moved from a position over i-75 from almost precisely west to east.

my first thought was that it was a chinese lantern because of the orange color, but i quickly changed my mind for 3 reasons:
1) it was far too large to the naked eye to be a chinese lantern 
2) it was moving far too fast (e to w) to simply be carried by the wind. also its movement was constant and steady.
3) it did not have smooth round edges. not only was it somewhat oblong horizontally, but along the visible edges there were "pieces" that appeared to be sticking out from the body of the object. i looked carefully to see if this was an effect of shimmering light, or the like. i am convinced this is not the case. this was an abnormal object.

i was able to capture the object on my cellphone, about 1 minute of video. unfortunately, the camera on my phone is poor quality, and i am not a very good impromptu filmmaker. i did not utilize the zoom feature on my camera, therefore the orange object (which you can see) appears very small, when in reality to the naked eye it was not small at all. it was actually quite large looking, and appeared to be somewhat near to the ground (i estimate 300 feet but it is hard to say).

after consulting my map upon getting home i was able to ascertain the movement of the object as almost exactly e to w.
content.summary: Solid orange color oval shaped ufo with uneven edges moved generally from w to e

content.detailedDescription: Was driving on a beautiful september day 2010 up at rommelåsen in skåne sweden, then suddenly when i looked out my left window i saw a cone shaped object ( like an american fotball though a little larger than such a fotball) following my car. i was driving with a speed of appr 70 km/h and the vessel was following me for at least 5 s just less than 1 meter away from where i was seated in my car.Remember that i said right out loud 'there is a ufo outside my window' just when i said that the vessel took off almost straight upwards with an incredible speed and disappeared. remember that the vessel was black and about 1 meter in diameter with a smooth surface. cannot tell if there were anything else that was visible to the design of the ufo that i saw that day. it was very emotional in a very uplifting way, didnt sence anything dangerous or something similar to fear or being frightened. instead i was very exited that i have been shown such a honorable sight, as an individual, that has for a long time been very interested in the ufo phenomena.
content.summary: Saw a cone scaped vessel beside my car at less than i meters distance for appr 5s than  took off with incredible speed

content.detailedDescription: May.23,2015 saturday at 2115 hrs. muscatine iowa. my partner and i were on foot patrol of security enforcement. my partner yells look in the sky ! i look up and seen a bright glowing orange color round orbs, size as a 747 jet ! it had no noise at all ! the ufo pass by us real fast about 400 mph, going south to north, then it passed it had a silver flash and reduce the size and vanished. i look toward south again seen two more ufo’s coming in formation side by side. it was going slower about 200 mph.  as it pass in front of us it had a silver flash and reduce the size and vanished also ! my partner took the pictures. couple other renter of apartment complexes see it too !
content.summary: The ufo look like orange color round orbs.
